definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯聯合酋長國|阿拉伯联合酋长国[A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2]

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi has nearly all the UAE's oil.
sentences.chinese: 阿联酋的石油几乎全部集中在阿布扎比酋长国。

sentences.english: Dubai free shuttle flight time line, according to the freedom of choice.
sentences.chinese: 阿联酋迪拜自由行，往返时间根据航班自由选择。

sentences.english: World's first camel-milk chocolates going global.
sentences.chinese: 世界首个骆驼奶巧克力在阿联酋问世。

sentences.english: Attack UAE is to clear ONE domain and influence on Middle-East.
sentences.chinese: 而攻下阿联酋就能够肃清ONE对中东的影响。

sentences.english: Do you think the UAE market is close to saturation point?
sentences.chinese: 你认为阿联酋市场接近饱和点？

sentences.english: Many Emiratis recognise that the law is muddled.
sentences.chinese: 许多阿联酋人意识到了这种法律上的混乱状态。

sentences.english: Creekside Park cable cars (gondolas) passing the Emirates Towers at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 暮色中的河畔公园以及正经过阿联酋大厦的缆车。

sentences.english: Both sides say the UAE will forego enrichment and sign the protocol.
sentences.chinese: 双方宣称阿联酋将放弃铀浓缩并签署该议定书。

sentences.english: It was played between China and the United Arab Emirates.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛是在中国队和阿联酋队之间展开的。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Madrid on EK (via Dubai).
sentences.chinese: 阿联酋航空公司经杜拜来回香港至马德里机票。

sentences.english: The UAE was India's biggest trading partner in the 2012-13 fiscal.
sentences.chinese: 13财年度，阿联酋是印度最大的贸易伙伴。

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi is one of seven semiautonomous emirates that make up the UAE.
sentences.chinese: 阿布扎比是阿联酋七个半自治酋长国之一。

sentences.english: All materials will be quarried in the UAE.
sentences.chinese: 所有的建筑材料都将采自阿联酋本国。

sentences.english: It was between Chinese team and the team of the United Arab Emirates.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛是在中国队和阿联酋队之间展开的。

sentences.english: The United Arab Emirates claimed to have created the world's first cloned camel.
sentences.chinese: 日前，阿联酋宣布成功培育出世界上首只克隆骆驼。

sentences.english: The landscape and climate of the UAE are integral to Emirati culture.
sentences.chinese: 阿联酋的地貌和气候是阿联酋文化不可或缺的一部分。

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)
nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
